description:
Light, packable and really well ventilated – Abisko Midsummer Jacket is a perfect companion when hiking in warm climates. The adjustable hood can be pulled up for protection against the sun or
light showers and the three pockets have mesh linings so that they double as ventilation openings. Made from G-1000 Air Stretch and pliant polyester that protects against wind and sun without letting you overheat.
name: Fjallraven Abisko Midsummer Jacket - Mens
